welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kalamazoo, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Explore our vibrant arts scene, craft breweries, and outdoor adventures â€“ we're thrilled to have you here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kalamazoo/Battle Creek International Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Kalamazoo/Battle Creek International Airport serves private and corporate aircraft and offers a comfortable waiting area for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at WK Kellogg Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at WK Kellogg Regional Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mariposa-Yosemite Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
